website_summaries.verdict: Alternative cordless phone option for those who crave aesthetics as much as functionality.
pros: Sleek, elegant, futuristic design makes this cordless phone eye-catching and complementary in a modern home
DECT 6.0 tech, caller ID, and answering machine
Internal directory holds up to 100 names
cons: Slightly higher cost for a single phone
Design may be an acquired taste

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; that’s where it ends.
customer_reviews.text: In the process of returning this. I should have listened to reviews but I sooooo badly wanted a unique phone for my art office. Unfortunately, looks are all it has. I haven’t even gotten to test sound quality because the phone doesn’t really charge, but it seems like all the reviews are accurate. Total bummer, but oh well; I need reliability and not looks, ultimately, so back it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We didn't have the phone for three weeks and it was complete static. After having the phone company come and check all the lines and whatnot we found out it was our brand new phone.
customer_reviews.author: George Shiffer

customer_reviews.title: Basic, low sound, cute design
customer_reviews.text: I have an intercom gate and it’s the only reason I have a landline. Since I’m not the only one in my home, I can’t always be expected to have my cell on me to buzz people in. This works well for that, and looks cute doing it. For the few who do call my landline still, the sound is low. When someone is leaving a message, it does not play through any speaker—you have to listen to your messages on the phone itself, so no screening calls.
customer_reviews.author: Leto Jane

customer_reviews.title: Has a Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone specifically for the speaker/intercom feature. I must have that in any phone. I also like the ergonomic shape and modern appearance. The ring is pleasant but not very loud and the caller ID does not show the actual phone NUMBER that is calling, just the name so if you want to call someone back your out of luck. Those are two things I don't like. It comes with a good battery that lasts a long time off of the base. Just be sure and charge it fully upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Blackwiddah

customer_reviews.title: Great looking phone.
customer_reviews.text: My original review does need upgrading and, all for good reasons. I am disabled spastic and it does take me a little longer to adjust. It is a very attractive piece with a nice built-in answering voice. The handset fits my face beautifully. That is something that no smart-phone has yet to master. A wonderful device well-worth the price of admission!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: 😑
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks, but despite reading the directions repeatedly, I could not figure out how to set up vm or keep the phone from switching languages to symbols. Which meant we couldn't read our saved info. 🤦‍♀️ then it stopped sending and receiving calls. Idk what I did wrong, but it wasn't simple and didn't have good instructions. 😐
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product pissed about wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Ok so im a little pissed because it whit and not black as per picture. I wanted a black phone but the phone itself it pretty awesome for its price. The black trim is sleek, and it is definitely a sleek design. Not worth the hassle of swapping it for black as advertizsed
customer_reviews.author: Bonesy

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: My first order i had to return due to one of the handset don't work. They send me a replacement and after two day i am having the same problem. The look of the phone is beautiful but it is very crappy.
customer_reviews.author: sweetlips

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not good, it’s just pretty different compact , but that’s it, I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with this phone, the phone itself is pretty, different, but the function I don’t like, it’s not loud enough you have to get really close to it to hear, it’s not what I expected, it wasn’t expensive but I wanted my phone to be what I really expected to be!
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza Aragones

customer_reviews.title: Great design poor quality 😢 very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It has a cool retro design the design is simply fantastic but I don't understand why the sound quality is so bad I hope they improve the sound remember it is a phone not a toy also I had to pay $13.75 to returned.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Nice for cheap home phone , seems to be touchy to charge on the cradle. Wish it was partly changed before I received it so I can test but will wait . Nice it has a voicemail option. I didn’t see that on the feature list
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C Reatherford

customer_reviews.title: Very Basic
customer_reviews.text: There is no "find handset" button. Everything is done on the handset concerning the answering machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G

customer_reviews.title: Unique, and works fine
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really had a chance to really dig in to all that it can do but a great phone for basic needs. Includes answering machine, phone book, caller Id. Call Log. Etc.
customer_reviews.author: jewlee vallare

customer_reviews.title: Cool little phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: the phone is awesome and the seller shipped it incredibly fast!!!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Cool phone
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it looked and wanted to keep but it didn't fit our needs , we liked the way it was so futuristic looking.
customer_reviews.author: K10 kelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to get dial tone from this phone
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: Really modern looking and works great but the volume is low even at high!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Micciola Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: This phone has as a nice design but would not charge up. No idea how it rates as fad as performance.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Thank you I did receive my refund, the phones are not what they look like on the picture, one did not get a dial tone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Scales

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dissatisfied!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My one phone died and it won't charge again, very frustrating. The other two now people can't hear me on them. Very poor quality phones and of course it happened right after the time frame that i could send them back or exchange them, how convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Matches my room perfect, phone works great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy phone
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, and shape makes it easy to hold while talking. Only challenge I had was getting the battery connection plugged in correctly, but wasn't an issue. So far, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bailey_sj

customer_reviews.title: Horrible phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality and volume. Even at the highest volume, you can't hear.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: Love the unique style and great cost of this phone !
customer_reviews.author: ilene Bezerman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a second line and isn't used much, therefore I couldn't give a very detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with putchase
customer_reviews.text: Not user friendly. Very complicated to set up answering machine. Instructions needed a magnifying glass to read them. Returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Pam E.

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking phone
customer_reviews.text: Cool phone everyone who comes over mentions it! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Sound is no good
customer_reviews.text: Landline home but quality of sound is poor not that clear I am not happy
customer_reviews.author: SHEMROZE S.

product_meta.title: iDECT Solo Plus Digital Cordless Phone with Answering Machine and Call Blocker (White)
product_meta.description: Color:White| Style:1 HandsetThe Solo Plus digital cordless phone with Answering machine and call Blocker combines modern technology, sophistication and innovative design with inspiration from the past. This chic classic design equipped with modern technology is everything you need in a home phone. The built-in nuisance call Blocker enables you to block callers you do not want to hear from, while the Answering machine, caller ID, and 100 Name and number phonebook help you keep in touch with family and friends.
feature_bullets: Features DECT 6.0 digital cordless technology and one Handset
Large Backlit blue 1.5-Inch Diagonal display and Backlit keyboard
Answering machine with 30 minutes of record time, Plus Caller ID memory with storage for up to 30 names and numbers (Caller ID requires a subscription from your telephone company)
10 selectable Ringtones and nuisance call Blocker

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars284 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
